description: This application is designed specifically for finding and reviewing properties owned and operated by UDR, Inc.  UDR provides high quality apartment homes, as well as superior service and value to our residents in Washington, Oregon, California, Arizona, Texas, Florida, Tennessee, Virginia, Maryland, and the District of Columbia.  You can find out more information on us at our website:  www.UDR.com   Driving around town looking for an apartment? Use your Palm Pre to find a UDR apartment and reserve your dream apartment in real-time before somebody else does.   Our Apartment Search App Features: Search for UDR apartment locations by State, region, city, price, bedrooms and bathrooms, GPS activation – the apartment search app knows where you are located, Put the apartment properties into your “Favorites" folder for easier access later on, The largest assortment of apartment photos, amenities and floor plans, Robust mapping and directions to your favorite apartments, Reserve an apartment from anywhere around the world, Check apartment pricing that is updated daily, Ability to call any apartment location 24/7.
